subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: SchemaCrawler looks for potential database design issues. Follow the steps below to run SchemaCrawler Lint.

ol.li: Make sure that the Java executable is on your path. (J2SE 6 or better is required.)

Copy the schemacrawler.config.properties
file into the lint example directory.
Start the database server by running StartDatabaseServer script from the distribution directory.
Start a command shell in the lint example directory.
To start with, run sc.cmd -c hsqldb -infolevel=maximum -command=lint (or sc.sh -c hsqldb -infolevel=maximum -command=lint on Unix)
Create the SchemaCrawler Lint report in XHTML and JSON formats.
Try creating your own database lints in a new jar.
